snippet.title: Age of Mythology: Retold - Immortal Pillars
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Immortal Pillars – The First Expansion for Age of Mythology: Retold! 
Play it when it releases on March 4th, 2025!

Immortal Pillars, the highly anticipated first expansion for Age of Mythology: Retold, invites you to harness the power of ancient Chinese mythology. Discover a world where gods, monsters, and legends collide in an epic new chapter of mythical strategy. 

This groundbreaking expansion brings a wealth of new content, allowing you to explore the rich mythology of China like never before. Take command of the gods, build your empire, and rewrite the legends of old. 

Pre-order now and be among the first to experience Immortal Pillars! 

Age of Mythology: Retold - Immortal Pillars is available March 4th on XBOX and PC 

Play Age of Mythology: Retold with Game Pass, and upgrade to the Premium Edition for this expansion and more!

Subscribe to Xbox 🎮 https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 
FOLLOW XBOX: 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Xbox 
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/Xbox 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/Xbox
TikTok: /Xbox

*Requires Age of Mythology: Retold or Xbox Game Pass membership (Ultimate and PC only). Included in Age of Mythology: Retold Premium Edition
**Online console multiplayer requires Game Pass Ultimate or Core, sold separately.

Audio Description: https://youtu.be/ROoy-TJJiWo

Stay connected with Age of Empires!

Website: https://www.ageofempires.com
Discord: https://discord.gg/ageofempires
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ageofempires
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/ageofempiresgame/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ageofempires
